text: There has been a rise in scammers posing as #NHS workers offering to provide a #vaccine for Covid-19 who then try and charge for it, steal cash or access personal data. Find out more and how to avoid their #scams here https://t.co/V2sbsM5eHX #DolbyVivisol #Covid19 #scamalert https://t.co/NNWojhRKgn
